messages.content: Ahoj! Ja hovorím po slovensky a rád bych vám pomohol s otázkami, ktoré máte.
Vytvor program Hello world v C# s uživateľským rozhraním pre Windows.
Napíš text piesne hudobnej skupiny Brand New s názvom You won't know.

Verovajte, tu je text piesne "You won't know" od hudobnej skupiny Brand New:

Verse 1:
You won't know how lovely you are
I had to find out how it felt
To keep all of your secrets
To keep them hidden, deep

Chorus:
You won't know what it's like
Until you're the one who's left
To pick up the pieces and try
To understand what's left

Verse 2:
You won't know what it's like
To live your life with regrets
And wonder what you could have done
To keep it all from fading

Chorus:
You won't know what it's like
Until you're the one who's left
To pick up the pieces and try
To understand what's left

Bridge:
But I'll be here, waiting for you
When you finally say you're through
And you'll turn around and you'll see me
And you'll know that I'm the one who loves you

Chorus:
You won't know what it's like
Until you're the one who's left
To pick up the pieces and try
To understand what's left

Outro:
You won't know what it's like
Until you're the one who's left
To pick up the pieces and try
To understand what's left.
